Salt_Lake_City.900 East (UTA station):
900 East is a light rail station in the Central City neighborhood of Salt Lake City, Utah, United States serviced by the Red Line of the Utah Transit Authority's (UTA) TRAX light rail system. The Red Line provides service from the University of Utah to Daybreak in South Jordan.


== Description ==
The station is located at 875 East 400 South (East University Boulevard/SR-186), with the island platform being in the median of 400 South.
